description.en:
The aim of this course is to present traditional public key cryptosystems and quantum-safe lattice-based cryptosystems. In this course, we review public key cryptosystems based on integer factorization problem and discrete logarithm problem over different groups. We discuss the required algorithms to implement a public key cryptosystem. We give a discussion on solving the hard problems. We review post-quantum cryptography by focusing on lattices. We provide details for quantum-resistant encryption schemes, key encapsulation mechanisms, and digital signature schemes. 
The course covers the following topics: integer factorization problem, RSA cryptosystem, discrete logarithm problem, Diffie-Hellman key exchange, how to solve integer factorization and discrete logarithm problem, elliptic curve cryptography, algorithms to implement RSA, Diffie-Hellman key exchange and ECDSA, introduction to post-quantum cryptography, lattice-based cryptography.
description.et:
Kursuse eesmärk on tutvustada traditsioonilisi avaliku võtme krüptosüsteeme ja kvantkindlaid võrepõhiseid krüptosüsteeme. Sellel kursusel vaatleme avaliku võtmega krüptosüsteeme, mis põhinevad täisarvu faktoriseerimise probleemil ja diskreetse logaritmi probleemil erinevate rühmade lõikes. Arutame avaliku võtme krüptosüsteemi rakendamiseks vajalikke algoritme. Arutame raskete probleemide lahendamist. Vaatleme postkvantkrüptograafiat keskendudes võredele. Pakume üksikasju kvantkindlate krüpteerimisskeemide, võtmekapseldamise mehhanismide ja digitaalallkirja skeemide kohta.
Kursusel käsitletakse järgmisi teemasid: täisarvu faktoriseerimise probleem, RSA krüptosüsteem, diskreetse logaritmi probleem, Diffie-Hellmani võtmevahetus vahetus, täisarvu faktoriseerimise ja diskreetse logaritmi probleemi lahendamine, elliptilise kõvera krüptograafia, algoritmid RSA rakendamiseks, Diffie-Hellmani võtmevahetus ja ECDSA, sissejuhatus postkvantkrüptograafiasse, võrepõhisesse krüptograafiasse.

objectives.en: - The idea of public key cryptography will be defined. The discussion on why we need public key cryptography will be done with real-world examples.
objectives.et: - Määratletakse avaliku võtme krüptograafia idee. Arutelu selle üle, miks me vajame avaliku võtmega krüptograafiat, viiakse läbi reaalsete näidetega.

objectives.en: - Integer factorization and discrete logarithm problems will be given. The algorithms to solve these problems will be discussed.
objectives.et: - Esitatakse täisarvude faktoriseerimine ja diskreetse logaritmi ülesanded. Arutatakse nende probleemide lahendamise algoritme.

objectives.en: - Elliptic curves in cryptography will be reviewed.
- The algorithms to implement traditional public key cryptosystems (RSA, DH, ECDSA, ECDH) will be reviewed. Implementation details will be discussed.
objectives.et: - Vaadeldakse traditsiooniliste avaliku võtme krüptosüsteemide (RSA, DH, ECDSA, ECDH) implementeerimise algoritme. Arutatakse rakendamise üksikasju.

objectives.en: - Quantum-safe cryptosystem families will be introduced. Lattice-based cryptosystems will be discussed.
objectives.et: - Tutvustatakse kvantkindlaid krüptosüsteemide perekondi. Arutatakse võrepõhiseid krüptosüsteeme.

objectives.en: This course will involve reading and writing of mathematical proofs and programming. We will explain the necessary mathematical background in the course.
objectives.et: See kursus hõlmab matemaatiliste tõestuste lugemist ja kirjutamist ning programmeerimist. Vajaliku matemaatilise tausta selgitame kursusel.

learning_outcomes.en: -understand the basic concepts and importance of public key cryptography
learning_outcomes.et: -mõistma avaliku võtme krüptograafia põhimõisteid ja tähtsust

learning_outcomes.en: -generate the parameter sets for the public key cryptosystems
-analyze and compare public key encryption, key exchange and digital signature schemes by considering the complexity and performance
learning_outcomes.et: -analüüsima ja võrdlema avaliku võtme krüptimise, võtmevahetuse ja digitaalallkirja skeeme, võttes arvesse keerukust ja arvutuslikult rasket probleemi

learning_outcomes.en: -learn post-quantum cryptography standardization efforts for encryption, key exchange and signature schemes
learning_outcomes.et: -õppima tundma postkvantkrüptograafia standardimise jõupingutusi krüptimise, võtmevahetuse ja allkirjaskeemide jaoks

learning_outcomes.en: -compare lattice-based cryptosystems in terms of security and performance.
learning_outcomes.et: -võrdlema võrepõhiseid krüptosüsteeme turvalisuse ja jõudluse osas.

description.et:
First meeting, course organization, grading
1.  	First meeting, course organization, grading
Basic primitives, definitions in public key cryptography (encryption, key encapsulation mechanism, identification schemes, digital signature)
2.  	Discrete logarithm problem (DLP), Diffie-Hellman key exchange, ElGamal public key encryption
3.  	Integer factorization problem, RSA cryptosystem, primality testing
4.  	Modular exponentiation algorithms, RSA and Chinese Remainder Theorem
5.  	Algorithms for integer factorization problem
6.  	Algorithms for DLP
7.  	Algorithms for DLP 
8.  	Elliptic curve Diffie-Hellman key Exchange, elliptic curve digital signature algorithm (ECDSA) over prime fields, algorithms for ECDLP 
9.  	Real-world examples of traditional public key cryptosystems
10. Basic primitives and definitions in post-quantum cryptography, post-quantum families, computationally hard problems 
11.  Introduction to lattices, LLL algorithm and properties of LLL reduced basis, Regev cryptosystem
12.  Lattice-based key encapsulation mechanisms (KEM) and their primitives
13. Lattice-based signature schemes and their primitives
14. Arithmetic operations (polynomial multiplication, matrix-vector product) for lattice-based cryptography
15. Project presentations
16. Project presentations

audience.et: Senior bachelor students in addition to M.Sc. and Ph.D. students.
